import React from 'react'; import personImage from '../src/assets/avatars.jpg'; import { AiFillTwitterCircle, AiFillLinkedin, AiFillGithub } from 'react-icons/ai'; import './Header.css'; const Header = () => { return (
{/* Text */}

Izhar Ali

Jr. DevOps Engineer and Designer

Freelancer providing services for programming and design content needs. Join me down below and let's get cracking!

{/* Image */}
{/* Icons */}
); }; export default Header;
